Question
========

A person achieves a score of 13.7 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 18.5 with a standard deviation 2.5. The z-score of the person with 13.7 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.92
* -1.86
* -1.1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.92: Correct
-1.86: Incorrect
-1.1: Incorrect
